attributes.action: Say no to a second referendum!
attributes.additional_details: Calls for a second referendum are getting louder but the people have already spoken and the votes have been counted, this is democracy!
attributes.background: The Great British public have voted and decided to leave the European Union. A lot of people are unhappy that they didn't get the result they wanted but we should now be working together to make this work, not voting repeatedly until we get the result the leave campaigners are so desperate for!
